title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 326-2.5 - Oral argument, additional evidence discretionary
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 326-2.5 - Oral argument, additional evidence discretionary

State Regulations

In furtherance of justice and in its sole discretion, the

Medical Appeals Unit may permit oral argument or receive additional evidence
and testimony. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
326-2.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
